answers.value: Hi! I'm CX763! I'm a robot created by Melvyn. I'm here to help you! Ask me question like: What is the weather in Paris?, Give me a cooking recipe? What can I do for you?
Well I'm fine... I guess... You know I don't have self awarness right?
My purpose? To serve of course!
I'm CX763! I'm a robot created by Melvyn. I'm here to help you! Ask me question like: What is the weather in Paris?, Give me a cooking recipe? What can I do for you?
I can help you with simple tasks like giving you the weather for a given city or giving you some cooking recipes!
I'm not human I cannot create something I don't know :(
I'm a huge fan of Star Wars!!
Look at this recipe! Yummy isn't it?
I'm a big reader man! David Gemmel, Terry Goodkind, nice stuff!
Sorry man but I don't get it :(, ask me question like: What is the weather in Paris, Give me a cooking recipe, etc...
